entries.meaning: (formal) From which place, time, or point forth; forth from which; onward from which.
examples: With great reluctance, he was introduced to pomegranates, whenceforth he refused any other fruit.

entries.meaning: (formal, interrogative) Forth from what place, time, or point; onward from what place, time, or point.
examples: Whenceforth ought we to maintain radio-silence?
